txt.en: Gredbyg devour and rot trees from below, striking fear into your Huorn companion and threatening Fangorn Forest.

As you wander Fangorn Forest, the Huorn travelling with you suddenly seems disturbed. It swiftly strikes a nearby stump with one of its roots causing numerous gredbyg to pour forth. It quickly crushes all of their number, but still appears upset.\n\nYou should search rotting stumps for more gredbyg and slay them before they can spread rot deeper into Fangorn.
The Huorn's anger seems to have subsided, and the gredbyg are no longer able to devour Fangorn from below, at least for the moment.
You have defeated many gredbyg and stopped them from causing more damage to Fangorn.
Gredbyg can be found under rotting stumps throughout southern Fangorn.\n\nThe Huorn has expressed naught but contempt for the gredbyg chewing upon the trees of Fangorn. You should defeat them.
Defeat Fangorn Hive-workers under rotting stumps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Fangorn Hive-workers under rotting stumps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
